skillTree.name: Warhorse
skillTree.description: The finest horses in the Old World, bred for their endurance and fiery temperament.

skillTree.name: Unicorn
skillTree.description: Its forehead adorned with a spiral horn, this noble mount carries the Damsel where their magical gifts are needed most.

skillTree.name: Aura of the Lady
skillTree.description: Acolytes too are blessed by the Lady's spirit, enabling them to resist magical attacks.

skillTree.name: Lady’s Mantle
skillTree.description: From the verdant depths, the Lady rises to protect the faithful.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Handmaiden of the Lady
skillTree.description: Blessed by the lady herself, the Grail Damsel shields the faithful from harm.

effects.description: Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition

skillTree.name: Aerial Shield
skillTree.description: The enemy's missiles and spells shed some of their momentum at the Damsel's behest.

skillTree.name: Prayer of Fortitude
skillTree.description: The Damsel's prayers empower her with the glory and faith of the Lady of the Lake.

skillTree.name: Shield of Combat
skillTree.description: The enemy's blows are magically deflected, giving the Damsel more time to focus on her magic.

skillTree.name: The Curse of the Lady
skillTree.description: Casting aside spoiled tokens of virtue and nobility, the Damsel beseeches the Lady to hinder the enemy's weapons.

skillTree.name: A Soft Spot for the Small Folk
skillTree.description: The affection of somebody so righteous and powerful is rare to the small folk of Bretonnia; the Damsel's very presence steels their resolve.

effects.description: Physical resistance: 1% for all Peasant units
Physical resistance: 3% for all Peasant units
Physical resistance: 5% for all Peasant units

skillTree.name: Enchanting Beauty
skillTree.description: The peasants know of the Damsel's beauty, but once the men-at-arms behold her in person, they fight with the bravery of a knight to please her.

ui_effects.description: Units won't regenerate if cap was reached

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Harmonic Convergence"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Harmonic Convergence Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Harmonic Convergence Upgraded"

Cooldown: -30% to "Curse of the Midnight Wind"

Cooldown: -50% to "Curse of the Midnight Wind"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Curse of the Midnight Wind"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Curse of the Midnight Wind Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Curse of the Midnight Wind Upgraded"

ui_effects.description: ➕ Calls down 3 projectiles each dealing 0 400 damage and 25 25 explosion damage (8m)
➕ Calls down 3 projectiles each dealing 0 400 damage and 25 25 explosion damage (8m)
➕ Calls down 3 projectiles each dealing 0 400 damage and 25 25 explosion damage (8m)
➕ Calls down 3 projectiles each dealing 0 400 damage and 25 25 explosion damage (8m)
➕ Calls down 3 projectiles each dealing 0 400 damage and 25 25 explosion damage (8m)

Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Urannon's Thunderbolt Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Urannon's Thunderbolt Upgraded"

ui_effects.description: ➕ Calls down 1 projectile dealing 1000 500 damage and 100 50 explosion damage (20m)
➕ Calls down 1 projectile dealing 1000 500 damage and 100 50 explosion damage (20m)
➕ Calls down 1 projectile dealing 1000 500 damage and 100 50 explosion damage (20m)
➕ Calls down 1 projectile dealing 1000 500 damage and 100 50 explosion damage (20m)
➕ Calls down 1 projectile dealing 1000 500 damage and 100 50 explosion damage (20m)

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Comet of Casandora"
Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Comet of Casandora Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Comet of Casandora Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Chain Lightning"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for all spells

ui_effects.description: ➕ Improves power recharge rate by 1 every 7 seconds

skillTree.name: Power Sap
skillTree.description: Drain the winds of magic before the enemy can turn them against us.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -5

skillTree.name: Experienced
skillTree.description: Practiced in the art of casting; always with a spell at the ready.

skillTree.name: Calming
skillTree.description: Your life is balanced on the edge of a knife when drawing from the winds. Too swift, and the winds will claim your life. Too slow, and the enemy will.

skillTree.name: Quell
skillTree.description: He who casts the first spell draws first blood.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic starting amount: -1
Enemy Winds of Magic starting amount: -3
Enemy Winds of Magic starting amount: -6

skillTree.name: Onslaught
skillTree.description: With the right amount of preparation, the winds can be harnessed to empower even the soldier’s mundane weapons.

skillTree.name: Potent
skillTree.description: So great is this one’s raw power that the winds gust in unison.

skillTree.name: Scouting
skillTree.description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Cleanse Corruption
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Untainted is increased by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Untainted is increased by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Untainted is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Steal Technology
skillTree.description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 4% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 18% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Block Army
skillTree.description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

skillTree.name: Cunning
skillTree.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

skillTree.name: Determined
skillTree.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

skillTree.name: Confident
skillTree.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

skillTree.name: Disciplined
skillTree.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

skillTree.name: Perceptive
skillTree.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

skillTree.name: Aggressive
skillTree.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

skillTree.name: Tough
skillTree.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

skillTree.name: Knowledgeable
skillTree.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -8

skillTree.name: Intelligent
skillTree.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors
